name: Just push the button (Harksa)
description:
Welcome to Button Press Corporation, your new ecologically-conscious, profit-driven, first family-friendly working environment. It's your first day, and in these times of crisis, how lucky should you feel to be our employee. We hope you follow our state-of-the-art training, so as to turn you into a happy, useful, and above all productive member of our noble company. Remember : there is no such thing as stupid work.

Voice by my dearest friend : Zalfos.

No he doesn't have an OnlyFan account, sorry about that.
